messages.subject: New Member-Kandice
messages.msgSnippet: You did what I did. Join them all :o) Welcome!!!! KIDS4GOD Learning Co. ~ o/~ o/~ o/~ o/~ Jolene Goens Heal me, O Lord, And I shall be healed... Jer 17:14
messages.messageBody:
You did what I did. Join them all :o) Welcome!!!!
KIDS4GOD Learning Co.
~\o/~\o/~\o/~\o/~
Jolene Goens
"Heal me, O Lord, And I shall be healed..." Jer 17:14

>>>
And we prefer a naturopath to a pediatritian any time!
<<<
I have a fantastic husband who backs me up in all of this natural living,
thankfully. :)
>>>>

Kandice,
You sound like me! I've had all homebirths & we do all natural too~even
w/ our special needs~w/ GREAT results.
Oh, I'm Jolene wife to David, Pastor, Fire Chief, & Tool Tech. We have 4:
Matthew~9, twins:Breanna & Brittany~6 1/2 & Kaiyah~4.
Hope to get to know you better. I'm not an unschooler per se but a
relaxed one definately. I do like alot of the unschooling ideas but as
Christians we believe that our children need training in all things
whether
by example or instruction. But I do not agree w/ the HS-ing movement in
general as to bringing a classroom into my home.
We teach by Character Qualities & Bible based-learning. The rest is
totally as our children are interested as the other takes all our time.
Glad to meet you!

KIDS4GOD Learning Co.
~\o/~\o/~\o/~\o/~
Jolene Goens
"Heal me, O Lord, And I shall be healed..." Jer 17:14
